mapper.update:
update product_charge
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product_charge set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
